  </script>
  <!-- utag_data -->
  <script data-article-byline="" data-article-keywords="" data-asset-id="" data-call-letters="KTVB" data-canonical-url="https://www.ktvb.com/" data-category="home" data-cct-story="false" data-content-categories="" data-content-score="" data-content-title="" data-content-type="index" data-division="broadcast" data-document-title="Boise's Leading Local News: Weather, Traffic, Sports and more | Boise, Idaho" data-ga-property-id="UA-72980132-1" data-gpt-network-code="32805352/id-boise-KTVB-B3349_DesktopTablet" data-item-number="" data-keywords="KTVB, Boise, news, local news, breaking news, traffic, weather, sports, events" data-market="Boise, ID" data-original-headline="Boise's Leading Local News: Weather, Traffic, Sports and more | Boise, Idaho" data-page-type="index" data-page-url="https://www.ktvb.com/" data-platform="desktop" data-section="home" data-site-type="desktop" data-subcategory="" data-subsection="" data-subtopic="" data-t1-publisher="" data-topic="None" data-topics-included="false" data-tracking-tags="" data-video-autoplay="false" data-video-included="false" data-video-title="" id="utag_data_script">

  <script>
   if(window.tegna.supportsJavascript){window.tegna.log=function(e,t,i,n){var o=20-e.length;o=o<0?0:o;var r=30-t.length;r=r<0?0:r;var a="log";"error"in console&&3===n?a="error":"warn"in                     <div class="lazy-image" data-blur="false" data-module="lazy-image">
                     <img alt="7's HERO: Nampa twins with Down syndrome spread awareness about ending the use of the " class="lazy-image__placeholder lazy-image__placeholder_blur_false" height="" r="" src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_16x9.jpg" width="" word=""/>
                     <img alt="7's HERO: Nampa twins with Down syndrome spread awareness about ending the use of the " class="lazy-image__image lazy-image__image_blur_false" data-src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_360x203.jpg" data-srcset="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_16x9.jpg 16w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_140x79.jpg 140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_360x203.jpg 360w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_540x304.jpg 540w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_750x422.jpg 750w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_1140x641.jpg 1140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c/08385322-58d1-4100-b4ef-384112ea332c_1920x1080.jpg 1920w" height="" r="" sizes="calc(50vw - 15px)" src="/assets/shared-images/backgrounds/blank.png" width="" word=""/>
                    </div>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="story-row__text">
                 <h4 class="story-row__title story-row__title_size_half">
                  <a class="story-row__title-link" href="/article/news/local/outreach/sevens-hero/sevens-hero-down-syndrome-awareness-nampa/277-f1ba4a94-4896-4342-9e40-0ddada7513c1">

             </ul>
            </div>
            <div class="header__subnav-group header__subnav-group_name_topics">
             <ul class="header__subnav-list">
              <li class="header__subnav-item header__subnav-item_type_text">

            <div class="header__subnav-group header__subnav-group_name_featured">
             <div class="header__featured-title">

             </div>
             <div class="story-row" data-module="story-row">
              <ul class="story-row__list">
               <li class="story-row__item story-row__item_size_half">

                 <div class="story-row__ratio-enforcer">
                  <div class="story-row__ratio-enforced">

   <main class="page__main" id="main">
    <div class="page__grid">
     <div class="grid grid_version_2-1" data-module="grid">
      <div class="grid__section grid__section_theme_default" data-theme="default" style="z-index:1">
       <div class="grid__theme-elements">
        <div class="grid__theme-design-1">
        </div>
        <div class="grid__theme-design-2">
        </div>
        <div class="grid__theme-design-3">
        </div>
        <div class="grid__theme-design-4">
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="grid__content grid__content_full-width_false">
        <div class="grid__main grid__main_sticky_none grid__main_full-width_false">
         <h1 class="grid__page-heading_visible_false">
          Boise's Leading Local News: Weather, Traffic, Sports and more | Boise, Idaho
         </h1>
         <div class="grid__cell grid__cell_columns_1" data-columns="1">
          <div class="grid__module grid__module_loaded_true">
           <div class="grid__module-sizer grid__module-sizer_name_story" data-count="1" data-module-sizer="story">
            <div class="story" data-module="story" data-more-link="" data-more-text="More">
             <div class="story__photo">
              <div class="story__ratio-enforcer">
               <div class="story__ratio-enforced">
                <a aria-label="Read Idaho Legislature outlines priorities for returning to session" class="story__link" data-tracking-action="story/imageLinkClicked" href="/article/news/politics/idaho-legislature-priorities-session/277-331014f2-f9d6-41e8-b524-511397cf5f9c">
                 <div class="lazy-image" data-blur="true" data-module="lazy-image" style="background-image: url(https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_16x9.png)">
                  <img alt="Idaho Legislature outlines priorities for returning to session" class="lazy-image__placeholder lazy-image__placeholder_blur_true" height="203" src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_16x9.png" width="360"/>
                  <img alt="Idaho Legislature outlines priorities for returning to session" class="lazy-image__image lazy-image__image_blur_true" data-src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_360x203.png" data-srcset="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_16x9.png 16w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_140x79.png 140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_360x203.png 360w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_540x304.png 540w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_750x422.png 750w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_1140x641.png 1140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_1920x1080.png 1920w" height="203" sizes="360px" src="/assets/shared-images/backgrounds/blank.png" width="360"/>
                  <noscript>
                   <img alt="Idaho Legislature outlines priorities for returning to session" class="lazy-image__nojs-image" height="203" loading="lazy" sizes="360px" src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_360x203.png" srcset="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_16x9.png 16w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_140x79.png 140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_360x203.png 360w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_540x304.png 540w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_750x422.png 750w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_1140x641.png 1140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/175324068/175324068_1920x1080.png 1920w" width="360"/>

                 </div>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="story__meta">
              <a class="story__link" data-tracking-action="story/linkClicked" href="/article/news/politics/idaho-legislature-priorities-session/277-331014f2-f9d6-41e8-b524-511397cf5f9c">
               <h4 class="story__title">
                Idaho Legislature outlines priorities for returning to session
               </h4>
               <p class="story__abstract">
                The legislature is scheduled to reconvene on April 6 after pausing the session for two weeks due to a COVID-19 outbreak.
               </p>
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="grid__module grid__module_loaded_true">
           <div class="grid__module-sizer grid__module-sizer_name_story-row" data-count="2" data-module-sizer="story-row">

                 <div class="carousel__ratio-enforcer">
                  <div class="carousel__ratio-enforced">
                   <a aria-label="Read Boise State pauses spring football due to increased COVID-19 cases" class="carousel__link" data-tracking="carousel/imageClicked" href="/article/sports/ncaa/ncaaf/boise-state-football/boise-state-pauses-spring-football-increased-covid-19-cases/277-5496df33-82a5-4663-87aa-88065babde73">
                    <div class="lazy-image" data-blur="true" data-module="lazy-image" style="background-image: url(https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/87598f42-7656-4d80-8cef-b4396f8847fc/87598f42-7656-4d80-8cef-b4396f8847fc_16x9.jpg)">

                 <div class="carousel__ratio-enforcer">

                   <a aria-label="Read Boise State pauses spring football due to increased COVID-19 cases" class="carousel__link" data-tracking="carousel/imageClicked" href="/article/sports/ncaa/ncaaf/boise-state-football/boise-state-pauses-spring-football-increased-covid-19-cases/277-5496df33-82a5-4663-87aa-88065babde73">
                    <div class="lazy-image" data-blur="true" data-module="lazy-image" style="background-image: url(https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/87598f42-7656-4d80-8cef-b4396f8847fc/87598f42-7656-4d80-8cef-b4396f8847fc_16x9.jpg)">

                <div class="story-list__text">
                 <h4 class="story-list__title">
                  <a class="story-list__title-link" href="/article/news/local/capitol-watch/idaho-legislature-may-halt-session-lawmakers-infected-with-covid-19-capitol-watch/277-3d87c8a2-4814-47e2-a466-8e1d3f3a094d">
                   Idaho Legislature votes to halt session after multiple lawmakers infected with COVID-19
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-list__abstract">
                  <a class="story-list__abstract-link" href="/article/news/local/capitol-watch/idaho-legislature-may-halt-session-lawmakers-infected-with-covid-19-capitol-watch/277-3d87c8a2-4814-47e2-a466-8e1d3f3a094d">
                   At least half a dozen legislators are currently positive for the virus.
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>

               <li class="story-list__item">
                <div class="story-list__photo">
                 <div class="story-list__ratio-enforcer">
                  <div class="story-list__ratio-enforced">
                   <a class="story-list__topic" href="/section/208">
                    The 208
                   </a>
                   <a aria-label="Read Eagle man proposes new bill prohibiting Idaho public schools from teaching 'racist, sexist' concepts" class="story-list__image-link" href="/article/news/local/208/idaho-bill-education-sexist-racist/277-1734f631-3dc7-46be-af46-36e52a9880c4">

                     <img alt="Eagle man proposes new bill prohibiting Idaho public schools from teaching 'racist, sexist' concepts" class="lazy-image__image lazy-image__image_blur_true" data-src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_750x422.jpg" data-srcset="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_16x9.jpg 16w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_140x79.jpg 140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_360x203.jpg 360w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_540x304.jpg 540w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_750x422.jpg 750w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_1140x641.jpg 1140w, https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f/12171905-f0b5-4d78-8feb-d67245b5028f_1920x1080.jpg 1920w" height="169" sizes="300px" src="/assets/shared-images/backgrounds/blank.png" width="300"/>
                    </div>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="story-list__text">
                 <h4 class="story-list__title">
                  <a class="story-list__title-link" href="/article/news/local/208/idaho-bill-education-sexist-racist/277-1734f631-3dc7-46be-af46-36e52a9880c4">
                   Eagle man proposes new bill prohibiting Idaho public schools from teaching 'racist, sexist' concepts
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-list__abstract">
                  <a class="story-list__abstract-link" href="/article/news/local/208/idaho-bill-education-sexist-racist/277-1734f631-3dc7-46be-af46-36e52a9880c4">
                   The bill was presented by Ed Humphreys of Eagle during a short seven-minute meeting of the Idaho House Education Committee.
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="story-list__item">
                <div class="story-list__photo">
                 <div class="story-list__ratio-enforcer">
                  <div class="story-list__ratio-enforced">
                   <a class="story-list__topic" href="/section/crime">
                    Crime
                   </a>
                   <a aria-label="Read Commissioner Davidson faces legal questions about his talk with a judge about Ammon Bundy" class="story-list__image-link" href="/article/news/crime/ada-commissioners-conversation-judge-draws-criticism-legal-question/277-e39e45b8-5370-45df-b479-efac81125f30">
                    <div class="lazy-image" data-blur="true" data-module="lazy-image" style="background-image: url(https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/61b659c2-0afd-47d7-9bb8-c0248c330425/61b659c2-0afd-47d7-9bb8-c0248c330425_16x9.jpg)">
                     <img alt="Commissioner Davidson faces legal questions about his talk with a judge about Ammon Bundy" class="lazy-image__placeholder lazy-image__placeholder_blur_true" height="169" src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/61b659c2-0afd-47d7-9bb8-c0248c330425/61b659c2-0afd-47d7-9bb8-c0248c330425_16x9.jpg" width="300"/>

                    </div>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="story-list__text">
                 <h4 class="story-list__title">
                  <a class="story-list__title-link" href="/article/news/crime/ada-commissioners-conversation-judge-draws-criticism-legal-question/277-e39e45b8-5370-45df-b479-efac81125f30">
                   Commissioner Davidson faces legal questions about his talk with a judge about Ammon Bundy
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-list__abstract">
                  <a class="story-list__abstract-link" href="/article/news/crime/ada-commissioners-conversation-judge-draws-criticism-legal-question/277-e39e45b8-5370-45df-b479-efac81125f30">
                   Davidson said he might have asked the judge if he could reverse course on Ammon Bundy's failure to appear warrant and allow the trial to proceed.
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>

                   Boise businesses miss out on economic boom as March Madness stays in Indiana
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-list__abstract">
                  <a class="story-list__abstract-link" href="/article/news/local/boise-businesses-miss-out-on-economic-boom-as-march-madness-stays-in-indiana/277-47515c33-eb7b-4876-b2de-5e15232d8cce">
                   Boise State University was scheduled to host First Round games on Thursday and Saturday. The NCAA changed course because of the COVID-19 pandemic.

                 <h4 class="story-list__title">
                  <a class="story-list__title-link" href="/article/news/local/208/idaho-bill-education-sexist-racist/277-1734f631-3dc7-46be-af46-36e52a9880c4">
                   Eagle man proposes new bill prohibiting Idaho public schools from teaching 'racist, sexist' concepts
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-list__abstract">
                  <a class="story-list__abstract-link" href="/article/news/local/208/idaho-bill-education-sexist-racist/277-1734f631-3dc7-46be-af46-36e52a9880c4">

                  </a>

                     <img alt="Commissioner Davidson faces legal questions about his talk with a judge about Ammon Bundy" class="lazy-image__placeholder lazy-image__placeholder_blur_true" height="169" src="https://media.ktvb.com/assets/KTVB/images/61b659c2-0afd-47d7-9bb8-c0248c330425/61b659c2-0afd-47d7-9bb8-c0248c330425_16x9.jpg" width="300"/>

                    </div>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="story-list__text">
                 <h4 class="story-list__title">
                  <a class="story-list__title-link" href="/article/news/crime/ada-commissioners-conversation-judge-draws-criticism-legal-question/277-e39e45b8-5370-45df-b479-efac81125f30">
                   Commissioner Davidson faces legal questions about his talk with a judge about Ammon Bundy
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-list__abstract">
                  <a class="story-list__abstract-link" href="/article/news/crime/ada-commissioners-conversation-judge-draws-criticism-legal-question/277-e39e45b8-5370-45df-b479-efac81125f30">
                   Davidson said he might have asked the judge if he could reverse course on Ammon Bundy's failure to appear warrant and allow the trial to proceed.
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="story-list__item">
                <div class="story-list__photo">
                 <div class="story-list__ratio-enforcer">
                  <div class="story-list__ratio-enforced">
                   <a class="story-list__topic" href="/section/local">
                    Local News
                   </a>

                <div class="story-list__text">
                 <h4 class="story-list__title">
                  <a class="story-list__title-link" href="/article/news/local/boise-businesses-miss-out-on-economic-boom-as-march-madness-stays-in-indiana/277-47515c33-eb7b-4876-b2de-5e15232d8cce">
                   Boise businesses miss out on economic boom as March Madness stays in Indiana
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-list__abstract">
                  <a class="story-list__abstract-link" href="/article/news/local/boise-businesses-miss-out-on-economic-boom-as-march-madness-stays-in-indiana/277-47515c33-eb7b-4876-b2de-5e15232d8cce">
                   Boise State University was scheduled to host First Round games on Thursday and Saturday. The NCAA changed course because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>

              </div>

          <h3 class="grid__module-heading">
           VERIFY
          </h3>
          <div class="grid__module grid__module_loaded_false">
           <div class="grid__module-sizer grid__module-sizer_name_story-row" data-count="2" data-module-sizer="story-row">
            <template class="grid__template">
             <div class="story-row" data-module="story-row">
              <ul class="story-row__list">
               <li class="story-row__item story-row__item_size_full">
                <div class="story-row__photo">
                 <div class="story-row__ratio-enforcer">
                  <div class="story-row__ratio-enforced">
                   <a aria-label="Read VERIFY: When will Social Security recipients get the third stimulus check?" class="story-row__image-link" href="/article/news/verify/when-can-ssi-get-third-stimulus-check-when-will-those-on-social-security-get-stimulus-check-2021-third-stimulus-irs-verify-fact-check/65-3e68fafa-170e-4443-bc3a-8282d8e4fad3">

                <div class="story-row__text">
                 <h4 class="story-row__title story-row__title_size_full">
                  <a class="story-row__title-link" href="/article/news/verify/when-can-ssi-get-third-stimulus-check-when-will-those-on-social-security-get-stimulus-check-2021-third-stimulus-irs-verify-fact-check/65-3e68fafa-170e-4443-bc3a-8282d8e4fad3">
                   VERIFY: When will Social Security recipients get the third stimulus check?
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="story-row__abstract">
                  <a class="story-row__abstract-link" href="/article/news/verify/when-can-ssi-get-third-stimulus-check-when-will-those-on-social-security-get-stimulus-check-2021-third-stimulus-irs-verify-fact-check/65-3e68fafa-170e-4443-bc3a-8282d8e4fad3">
                   The third round of stimulus checks hit many bank accounts this week. But when can those on Social Security see payments?
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="story-row__item story-row__item_size_full">

                 <h4 class="story-row__title story-row__title_size_full">

  <script>

var requirejs, require, define; !function (global, setTimeout) { function commentReplace(e, t) { return t || "" } function isFunction(e) { return "[object Function]" === ostring.call(e) } function isArray(e) { return "[object Array]" === ostring.call(e) } function each(e, t) { if (e) { var i; for (i = 0; i < e.length && (!e[i] || !t(e[i], i, e)) ; i += 1); } } function eachReverse(e, t) { if (e) { var i; for (i = e.length - 1; i > -1 && (!e[i] || !t(e[i], i, e)) ; i -= 1); } } function hasProp(e, t) { return hasOwn.call(e, t) } function getOwn(e, t) { return hasProp(e, t) && e[t] } function eachProp(e, t) { var i; for (i in e) if (hasProp(e, i) && t(e[i], i)) break } function mixin(e, t, i, r) { return t && eachProp(t, function (t, n) { !i && hasProp(e, n) || (!r || "object" != typeof t || !t || isArray(t) || isFunction(t) || t instanceof RegExp ? e[n] = t : (e[n] || (e[n] = {}), mixin(e[n], t, i, r))) }), e } function bind(e, t) { return function () { return t.apply(e, arguments) } } function scripts() { return document.getElementsByTagName("script") } function defaultOnError(e) { throw e } function getGlobal(e) { if (!e) return e; var t = global; return each(e.split("."), function (e) { t = t[e] }), t } function makeError(e, t, i, r) { var n = new Error(t + "\nhttp://requirejs.org/docs/errors.html#" + e); return n.requireType = e, n.requireModules = r, i && (n.originalError = i), n } function newContext(e) { function t(e) { var t, i; for (t = 0; t < e.length; t++) if (i = e[t], "." === i) e.splice(t, 1), t -= 1; else if (".." === i) { if (0 === t || 1 === t && ".." === e[2] || ".." === e[t - 1]) continue; t > 0 && (e.splice(t - 1, 2), t -= 2) } } function i(e, i, r) { var n, o, a, s, u, c, d, p, f, l, h, m, g = i && i.split("/"), v = y.map, x = v && v["*"]; if (e && (e = e.split("/"), d = e.length - 1, y.nodeIdCompat && jsSuffixRegExp.test(e[d]) && (e[d] = e[d].replace(jsSuffixRegExp, "")), "." === e[0].charAt(0) && g && (m = g.slice(0, g.length - 1), e = m.concat(e)), t(e), e = e.join("/")), r && v && (g || x)) { a = e.split("/"); e: for (s = a.length; s > 0; s -= 1) { if (c = a.slice(0, s).join("/"), g) for (u = g.length; u > 0; u -= 1) if (o = getOwn(v, g.slice(0, u).join("/")), o && (o = getOwn(o, c))) { p = o, f = s; break e } !l && x && getOwn(x, c) && (l = getOwn(x, c), h = s) } !p && l && (p = l, f = h), p && (a.splice(0, f, p), e = a.join("/")) } return n = getOwn(y.pkgs, e), n ?   <script>
   if (window.tegna.supportsJavascript) {
                var script = document.createElement('script');
                script.src = "https://www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js";
                script.async = true;
                script.defer = true;
                var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
                firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(script, firstScriptTag);
            } else {
                var script = document.createElement('script');
                script.src = "https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=UA-72980132-1";
                var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
                firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(script, firstScriptTag);

                window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
                gtag('js', new Date());
                gtag('config', 'UA-72980132-1');
